title: The Australian Securities Exchange paused its years-long blockchain project to replace its settlement and clearing system, saying it plans to write-off $175M (Michael McSweeney/The Block)
description:
Michael McSweeney / The Block:

author: Sam Sutton and Declan Harty
title: Crypto giant’s failure exposes cozy Washington ties, weak regulation
description: FTX's stunning meltdown last week is forcing lawmakers and regulators who bought into the vision to regroup.
content: It is crucial that we develop a clear understanding of the chain of events and management failures that led to this collapse, said Rep. Brad Sherman (D-Calif.), one of the industrys most vocal skepti… [+5856 chars]

author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Over a million are owed money by failed crypto exchange
description: Experts and watchdogs warn UK investors that when crypto firms fail, getting money back is unlikely.
content:
Over a million people and businesses could be owed money following the collapse of the crypto exchange FTX, according to bankruptcy filings.
There have also been reports that FTX suffered a hack, ta… [+5138 chars]

author: Faustine Ngila
title: FTX's collapse has sent shivers down the spine of Africa's crypto community
description: Sam Bankman-Fried has quickly become a persona non grata everywhere, including in Africa. Once hailed as a crypto guru, the collapse of his FTX exchange platform has sent shockwaves round the world, taking with it billions of investors’ money. Even as he cont…

author: Scott Nover
title: Who else has been hurt in the FTX fallout?
description: Gemini, Genesis, BlockFi, and a teachers' pension fund are all caught up in the crypto implosion
content:
FTX, one of the worlds largest cryptocurrency exchanges, imploded last week.

author: Edward Harrison
title: Crypto's Future Is In the Regulated Banking System
description: The utopian ideal of a new form of money is fading fast, but blockchain technology could play a critical role in bolstering trust in finance
content: After hitting all-time highs in 2021, cryptocurrency prices havent found a definitive floor. And the appeal of cryptos promise to reinvent money has also reached its limit in a very niche audience. T… [+795 chars]
